Colin Powell : I am not committed to Barack Obama Former secretary of state and chairman of the joint chiefs of staff Colin Powell offered praise for Barack Obama 's accomplishments but refused to say whether he would endorse Barack Obama or any of the emerging Republican hopefuls in 2012.

Donald Rumsfeld smiles at this indulgence and says: I don't need caffeine. He has a decaf. As we get ready to part, we resort to the standard topic for male banter- sport.
